name: DiceShift
description:
DiceShift is a short collect-a-thon where you play as a dice that can shape-shift into different types of dice to help navigate the world around them. You begin as only a single shape, but with every level you will earn the ability to use a new shape to help you overcome obstacles and reach new collectibles.

Each level is brief, and has 5 objectives to pursue. Once you've earned the ability in a level you can then revisit any previous levels with your newfound skills! Good luck and happy collecting!

This project was my submission to the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
